name: Hungry Zombie
description:
Everyone loves pizza, and zombies are no exception! Zombies like to make you work to deliver their pizza and are always up to no good. Be careful for their traps and trivia. If these zombies are giving you too hard of a time, you can always visit the other human in town. He will give you tips, it is your first day after all! Regularly check the quest post, located in the middle of town, to see what deliveries you have left to do while on the job. Good luck!

To play:

Begin by checking the post next to you when you begin, it will help you know what needs to be done for the day! The posts outside of each house will also help you along the way.

Controls:

z - enter (collect an object, move on object, view an object, interact with characters, etc.)

arrow keys as normal
